content.raw:
We could try to improve the check and fix the problem for upcoming versions. 

CMake 3.0.2 [provides the MSVC_VERSION](http://www.cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.0/variable/MSVC_VERSION.html) variable which defines the version of Visual C/C++ used, following the logic:

```
1700 = VS 11.0 (would be VS2012)
1800 = VS 12.0 (would be VS2013)
...
```

So for requiring something equal or greater to 2012 we could go with something like:

```
if (MSVC_VERSION LESS 1800)
    message(FATAL_ERROR "${PROJECT_NAME} requires VS 2013 or greater.")
endif()
```
